verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> on Neginoth <WH5058> upon <WH5921> Sheminith, <WH8067> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> O LORD, <WH3068> rebuke <WH3198> me not <WH408> in thine anger, <WH639> neither <WH408> chasten <WH3256> me in thy hot displeasure. <WH2534>
Have mercy <WH2603> upon me, O LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am weak: <WH536> O LORD, <WH3068> heal <WH7495> me; for <WH3588> my bones <WH6106> are vexed. <WH926>
My soul <WH5315> is also sore <WH3966> vexed: <WH926> but thou, <WH859> O LORD, <WH3068> how long? <WH5704> <WH4970>
Return, <WH7725> O LORD, <WH3068> deliver <WH2502> my soul: <WH5315> oh save <WH3467> me for thy mercies' sake. <WH4616> <WH2617>
For <WH3588> in death <WH4194> there is no <WH369> remembrance <WH2143> of thee: in the grave <WH7585> who <WH4310> shall give thee thanks? <WH3034>
I am weary <WH3021> with my groaning; <WH585> all <WH3605> the night <WH3915> make I my bed <WH4296> to swim; <WH7811> I water <WH4529> my couch <WH6210> with my tears. <WH1832>
Mine eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> because of grief; <WH4480> <WH3708> it waxeth old <WH6275> because of all <WH3605> mine enemies. <WH6887>
Depart <WH5493> from <WH4480> me, all <WH3605> ye workers <WH6466> of iniquity; <WH205> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my weeping. <WH1065>
The LORD <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> my supplication; <WH8467> the LORD <WH3068> will receive <WH3947> my prayer. <WH8605>
Let all <WH3605> mine enemies <WH341> be ashamed <WH954> and sore <WH3966> vexed: <WH926> let them return <WH7725> and be ashamed <WH954> suddenly. <WH7281>
